Text: Schwartz's (French: "Chez Schwartz"), also known as the Montreal Hebrew Delicatessen (French: "Charcuterie Hebraique de Montréal, Inc."), is a delicatessen restaurant and take-out, located at 3895 Saint-Laurent Boulevard in Montreal, Quebec.
Triplets:<Schwartz's
2:
--------------------
Text: Schwartz's:  Schwartz's is the most famous remaining Montreal-style smoked meat restaurant.
Triplets:<Schwartz's
3:
--------------------
<Text: Schwartz's:  The restaurant also sells smoked meat by mail order.>
